scripts.clean: if [ -d build ]; then rm -rf build; fi
scripts.start: npm run clean; mkdir build; npm run pug; npm run stylus; npm run watch & live-server --wait=1000 build
scripts.stylus: stylus -u ./node_modules/poststylus --with "[require('${PWD}/node_modules/autoprefixer')({ browsers: ['last 3 versions'] }), require('${PWD}/node_modules/css-mqpacker'), require('${PWD}/node_modules/postcss-flexbugs-fixes')]" -I node_modules/sanitize.css/lib -o build src/index.styl
scripts.watch: npm run pug -- -w & npm run stylus -- -w
scripts.compile: NODE_ENV=production npm run pug && npm run stylus -- -c
scripts.build: npm run clean; mkdir build; npm run compile; npm run cp; npm run cname
